website_summaries.verdict: This is literally a flush toilet you can take camping with you.
pros: Can flush up to 50 times before needing to be emptied
Can handle a lot of weight
cons: The seat on this toilet is not as large as a regular toilet seat

customer_reviews.title: This toilet is great! Doesn't leak
customer_reviews.text: This toilet is great! Doesn't leak. Only problem is I keep it closed while "going" and when I pull the lever, there's splashback. If I keep it open while "going", it smells, so now I finish, close the lid and then pull lever.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice toilet ready to use for the most part. I'm a big guy 6' nearly 400lbs. and this toilet works good. Flush is good and water rinse spray does well. Self contained leaving no mess behind. I have yet to empty the unit yet but all seems very easy to use. For me a little more elongated would make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a queen
customer_reviews.text: We went camping this weekend and used the SereneLife portable toilet. It has changed my camping life! I feel like a queen! No more middle of the night trips to the trees! My husband loves it that I’m not tripping over my feet on the way. This product seems to be high quality. At this point I would give it a thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Just updraged to this after using a different, smaller brand that was half the price of this. The extra cost is worth it. Better flush system, bowl, dump tube, surface texture, has a tank meter... All around improvement. Will update if any problems arise. The smaller one had a very slow leak from... somewhere I could never seem to pinpoint... Maybe the pull lever? Idk. Hopefully not the case with this new one. They all wear out over time and need to be replaced but this is already better and seems more durable.
customer_reviews.author: NO

customer_reviews.title: So far I am very pleased with function
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with function, the increased capacity and overall quality. Some have indicated they were unable to completely empty the waste tank but I found that to be negligible for continued use since you will be adding treatment and if storing you will be rinsing it out. I do not have any real concerns at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Seat is too small
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday Friday 4/20/2018, opened well packaged box no damage. Discovered the seat opening was way to small for an average adult male. Seat opening more suitable for a petite person or child. Also the area under the seat is kind of sharp and would require some sanding ( could cut a pickle). The lid is pretty flimsy and has a warning to not lean against it. Other than the above, it appears pretty well made. What can you expect for $99. Returned it 4/21/2018. Will look for another with a larger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Epinomdus

customer_reviews.title: Leaking gauge right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've bought this model toilet. The first one I bought lasted about a year with daily use. This one was leaking on the first fill. The gauge that displays how "full" the waste tank is supposed to be was never very accurate, but on this unit, it leaks and makes a huge mess. The tank is supposed to hold 5 gallons but I have to empty it as soon as it's only half full to avoid getting waste all over the place. I will not be buying this model a third time.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and works great. Use on pontoon boat during fishing outings
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and works great. Use on pontoon boat during fishing outings. Easy portability. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Received a day earlier than expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I am living in an old farm house with no plumbing upstairs. There are 16 stairs to navigate to get to the bathroom at night. I needed help. I searched the Internet for a portable product that would make it possible to avoid middle of the night bathroom visits. This is the perfect solution. Neat, clean and easy to empty with no spills and no odor! The holding tank is generously large so I empty once a week. I would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Kay K.

customer_reviews.title: seat opening to small
customer_reviews.text: When I sat on the toilet with original seat it crushed my balls, very uncomfortable. I designed and built a wood frame to go around the toilet. It made the seat opening bigger and raised it up 4 inches. Very comfortable to set on and easy to get off when you are 73. I plan to use it if my septic tank system fails and I have to wait till plumber can come and fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!! GET THE TALLER ONE!! Great price👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Great price👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 I’m TOTALLY POOP-FOBIC and have used one for years in a T.T. ——NO PROBLEMS (ion flush-slide slow for the first 1/2in. Then let-er-go!!! LOL (a little pressure builds in the holding tank ( that’s how airtight it is.) alleight othervids. Show putting blue stuff in bottom?? Pot in top clean water!! ABSOUTLY NO SMELL!!!!👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼 (GET THE TALLER ONE, !! MAJOR DIFFERENCE !! You feel like an adult and you don’t have to deal with it nearly as much. Disposal in a toilet works perfectly! Not that I’m excited about this subject or process; however, If you have a bad system you will really appreciate one that works well❗️❗️❗️ 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: N77E

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: We use this for tent camping. It works much easier than the 5gallon bucket style. We sprayed the inside with cooking spray to help keep inside bowl clean each #2 use. Do not use packets in water tank. Only in compartment for waste.
customer_reviews.author: CWM

customer_reviews.title: Porta-Potty came USED! 😡💩
customer_reviews.text: Buyer BEWARE!!! DONT BUY! NOT WORTH THE RISK!!!! 💩 Mine Came USED!!!!!!! 💩 I received this item and it had been USED!! As I unpackaged it, I heard a ‘sloshing’ noise. I figured that maybe they had included some type of tank cleaner or neutralizer with it... took the plastic off the upper cassette-it wasn’t terrible looking. Didn’t look 100% brand new, but also, not terrible. When I disconnected it to check the bottom casette-thats when I found it had been used. Found proof of #1 and #2 (🤢). Disgusting. Contacted amazon... and returned it. VERY Disappointed that something like this was sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exploding sewer toilet.
customer_reviews.text: Hummm... When I read the reviews about this toilet exploding sewer back at you when you flush I didn't realize the truth of the statement... I'm here to say exploding pressure is a real thing. It does. Other than that.... It doesn't leak. It's sturdy. It's easily portable. I wouldn't buy it again. if you have an option to buy a different one that doesn't have that blow back effect get something better. It's disgusting. Maybe I'm doing it wrong. I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Bee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Skoolie rebuild!!
customer_reviews.text: Exact size I needed! Fits in my bus so well!! I was even able to find a toilet lid cover for it! Not too heavy to move, and has a convenient carrying case with handles, to help. I am a petite person, only 5' 2" 118lbs, and the item fits me well, but I would imagine a larger person would not do well with the seat size, and probably need to add or build a larger top to sit on.. otherwise I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: no more buckets for me
customer_reviews.text: where I live we get flooded , lost our first home in 2011, this past month we had another didn't loose our home , but was stuck in the house for a little over 2 weeks with water surrounding us, so we had to do all our business in a bucket , which is not fun, we have tested the Serenelife portable toilet out and this is going to be a life changer for when the next flood happens , because I am not going to use a bucket again,
customer_reviews.author: Julie welch

customer_reviews.title: Not for larger behinds. But does it job well for early morning needs when camping
customer_reviews.text: The seat is a little small for an average guy and being round if you sit forward your PNS will be touching the inside of bowel. Hovering may be required. The function is very good. There is an air "Bloop" when you flush. Put the lid down or be prepared for splash up when opening the flush valve. The flush does clean whole bowel but may have trouble with TP clump going though drain hole.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Watts

customer_reviews.title: Flush pump failed
customer_reviews.text: Went on month long road trip, was easy to set up and use, 2 days in flush pump failed and wouldn’t work, had probably 5 uses... Haven’t had service as I was in remote places that WiFi was scarce, return window closed. Disappointed to say the least..
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have the leak seal issue which isn’t a problem. I thought it would be when lifting up and carting. I have wrist problems and I can’t let this get too full before carting out. I only use for liquids. And when I can’t endure temps outside to the outhouse. Which has made me less prone to serious complications I have with chronic pneumonia. Easy to clean. I use tiny chlorine chips from pool pucks to keep the scent manageable and indrip them into the intake water. Awesome that you can use the intake for grey water because that is what we do. Make sure there are no food pieces with a little screen your water first.
customer_reviews.author: Jello

customer_reviews.title: Good performer.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a good solution for me. I am taking out my toilet in my new trailer and will use this instead. No sewage holding tank issues for me. Just the 5 gallons to dump when I need a toilet. The design is pretty good . It functions well on my water testing done so far. More improvements are needed to get to 5 stars. The buckle clamps to hold the too and bottom together are weak points. And the flushing pump works hard. Customer care is good so far with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK G.

customer_reviews.title: I like that it holds a lot so you don't have ...
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this toilet for the past couple weeks. It does the job. I like that it holds a lot so you don't have to empty it as much. Cleaning it is a bit difficult in my opinion and if you don't clean it THOROUGHLY then you will be left with a smell. But I just find it difficult to clean cause its bulky and slightly heavy when I go to clean it and I'm certainly not the strongest individual in the world. It is very sturdy. And is taller then I had expected it to be. If I needed to get another one of these, I would in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved our life during our bathroom remodel! Used for 7 weeks straight and the flush handle is starting to get a bit loose and sometimes gets stuck but I don’t think these things are really intended to be used for such an extended period like we have, so it makes sense that a moving plastic part would start to wear out. All in all it was definitely worth purchasing and we will keep for when we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I rent a shed so it's perfect for whenever I need to go to the bathroom, it can be a bit small and tight but it's manageable. I'm a 5'5 guy so it's perfect in my opinion. My only issue with it is that the bellows pump doesn't rinse the entire bowl like I believe it should but it eventually does after 3 pumps with altered hand pressures. Make sure to get some deodorizer for the septic tank or it will smell like someone passed gas every time you flush. I love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Ericka & Chris

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 7 months of continual use, and still going!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use till we got plumbing, it took longer than we thought so we have been using it for about 7 months straight as our only toilet! It's great. No structural or parts damage, don't think it was meant to be used this hardcore haha. Make sure to use the portal packs, one pod only per round. Fill it with a little water, then add the pod, you'll be a lot happier with the smell that way. Also if you empty it before it gets super full you will have a MUCH easier time. I would 100% buy this again for myself or any friend or family member that needed one.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: We have no issue with this product at all!!! It was easy to carry, easy to clean, it worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT POTTY
customer_reviews.text: We just had our maiden voyage with our new potty. It was so nice not having to use those smelly vault toilets at our campground. We found our potty to be quite comfortable, worked wonderfully, and reasonably odor free. We used the Porta Pack holding tank drop-ins for odor control and they worked great! One thing that we will do differently next time is to use porta-potty TP instead of regular TP. The deodorizing packet said that we could use regular TP, but it is not dissolved quickly enough and makes emptying the bottom tank difficult. All in all, we are very pleased with this toilet and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Horton

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight plus easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased while my home was under renovations, and this little pot saved us! Lightweight plus easy to set up and use. Don't forget to purchase your deodorizer with it! Thanks SereneLife!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Green

customer_reviews.title: Seat Size.
customer_reviews.text: Seat is too small for anyone other than a small child. Seat dimensions were not listed in the write up. We were very disappointed when we opened the box and discovered the small seat as we were preparing for a road trip. It just won't do. Sad to say, the 30 day period for product returns had expired by the time we opened the box and found this small seat. Buyer beware. Save your money and go with another product with an adequate size toilet seat!
customer_reviews.author: CPIL

customer_reviews.title: Solid toilet
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, with the seat being the flimsiest piece but still sturdy. Bowl is shallow but worked for me. I drove many miles with the waste tank half full and sloshing with no leakage or smells. I always keep a blue sanitation tab in the waste side and it seems to work well. The only minus would be the carry case which is kind of cheap. I recommend storing it in a garbage bag in your car for added protection.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and empty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and empty. Its nice to have the capacity meter. It is almost full size - so also quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mt Greylock Campsite Park

customer_reviews.title: SereneLife Outdoor Portable Toilet
customer_reviews.text: We have a cabin that is winterized at the moment but we have some work to get done on it so we have been there for quite some time a few days so we bought this portable toilet so when nature calls we are prepared. We have used it quite a bit and we are very happy with it. It is very easy to operate the grandkids like it and it is very sturdy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to avoid stopping at bathrooms on a road trip and for camping and it works well. All you need is to add some RV toilet chemicals to the waste tank before using it and fill the flush tank with water and you're all set. The lid seals well and keeps odors to a minimum. There is no easy way to clean the waste tank though. I end up filling it with clean water and shaking it around and pouring it out until it seems clean. Be careful if you are coming from differing elevations as it seals well and when you open it you might get a splash in the face.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great toilet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toilet for my studio shop area that has no facilities. Set it up and used it for the first time and it flushed beautifully and seems to work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Tita Husted

customer_reviews.title: so good!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly adequate Portable Toilet. Quiet, lightweight enough for even the smaller women in my family to work with (empty, fill, etc). Mom says flushing is quiet, seems solid enough -- and it does seem to be odorless. Purchased for a family cabin in Northern NH, specifically to avoid those "after dark" trips to the outhouse. We generally DON'T do Number 2 in a portable. And, we have a covered trashcan for toilet paper. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Robynn Brannen

customer_reviews.title: LOOKS AND FEELS A LOT LIKE A REAL TOILET
customer_reviews.text: I find that this toilet is very useful for my needs... I recently converted my garage into a beautiful guest room.I did not want the expense of plumming so I decided to buy a potable toilet. And this one works just fine for when guests come. Thanks so much for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy TwoHearts

customer_reviews.title: I will purchase again and again
customer_reviews.text: I order this product in Abril 2018 and let me tell you we love it we use this every camping trip, after we return home I clean it really really well and put it back in the box it looks like new ( now 2 years later my daughter start potty training and when we camp she use it ) it's being a really big help ) especially in the middle of the night or in the morning when its really cold
customer_reviews.author: Alain198

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded my expectations. It sits higher than our old one. Love it. The level gauge works well. Love it. The piston flush is much better than the old system. Love it. The swivel drain tube is nice, but the diameter of the tube is smaller than our old drain hole. It tried to clog a couple of times with solids in the tank, but it drained. A very good unit. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lockard

customer_reviews.title: Release the pressure before using!
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s a great little toilet. I have learners though, that it’s best to open the flush valve once before using it. This keeps it from spraying everywhere when you release pressure from the holding tank. Once my girlfriend got a face full of pee and we had to clean up the walls and even ceiling as it exploded trying to flush it. Lesson learned. Flush slowly and release the pressure first!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I have only used it for one day with limited waste, but so far it seems to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product came ready to use out of the box. I have only used it for one day with limited waste, but so far it seems to be a great product that delivered as promised!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Hole not large enough
customer_reviews.text: works great for (woman) man require a bigger openning(hole)..if the seat hole was elongated and a bit bigger it would be a BIG 5 star...I give it 4 star because it works great, easy to dump/clean and showed no leaks in 5 days out at camp..
customer_reviews.author: Asencion C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems good so far.
customer_reviews.text: Toilet seems good so far. Don’t have any long term use experience yet. I would recommend it this far. Only thing is you’ll have to buy a separate bag for it. The bag that comes with it is not the bag in the picture. It’s made of very thin tissue like paper. Contacted the company and they apologized and said the picture was a mistake so I appreciated that. Otherwise the toilet seems very nice so far!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: The company does NOT value their customers and will not back their product!
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the toilet worked well. I only used this toilet for a couple of camping trips last year. I always keep it cleaned out. The holding tank has a thin area in the front middle. Looks like a mold process issue. I tried calling and messaging the company! The worst company to deal with. You should NOT buy from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our 22 ft bayliner, and use on San Diego harbor for the summer. It functions well, cleans fast, although heavy when half full. Men should #1 somewhere else, but for others and a urgent urge this is more than adequate. 2 seasons of use no issues. For the price point and it’s intended use, it’s a go!
customer_reviews.author: mgd675

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and indispensable in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: Bought this SereneLife Outdoor toilet because we are having septic tank issues. Well, had to pull this out yesterday when things started backing up. It has been a lifesaver! Extremely easy to put into use and it fits in our small bathroom without any problems so we still have privacy. It is comfortable to sit on and a breeze to flush. The supplied odor control pouch is doing the job. Highly recommend it! We have not had to empty it yet, but that looks easy enough.
customer_reviews.author: SherryUtah

customer_reviews.title: Nice portapotty for anywhere there's no bathroom nearby.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this when we went camping in our enclosed trailer instead of our camper. It's a great little portable toilet. I didn't have to walk out in the dark woods during the night to relieve myself and it did not stink after 3 days of use. Very easy to clean, (husbands job 😂) and very handy. Would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Donatella

customer_reviews.title: Looks great !
customer_reviews.text: We have not yet used our toilet, we leave for our trip tomorrow. BUT, we have opened the package & explored the functions, ie. read through the instruction manual, taken apart the product (simulated emptying waste), had children age 5-13 sit on it, as well as 200 lb husband & all say that it feels sturdy and comfortable. We will update our review once we return from our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and with wild fires and forced evacuations this is a must if you ask me.
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning to put it away for storage is a bit of work. If you are on the riad just dumping seems ok. Washing the bowl is no problem at all. Complaining about stuff being small is rediculous. Have you ever been in an airplane? Good price and it does its job. Maybe put wheels on it for easier transportation to dump site. The one that have wheels are probably more expensive. Dealing with the wild fires this is a must. Use your own head and just dump at the stinky truck stops any day lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dcomp13

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Got it for Camping and as luck would have it ( BAD LUCK), my pipes are froze!! Toilet is paying for itself NOW!! Little pain to empty totally but working better than my indoor plumbing :):):):)
customer_reviews.author: james tyler

customer_reviews.title: Needed this during renovations
customer_reviews.text: Having only one bathroom, and then having it upgraded left us without the use of a toilet for most of every work day for several weeks. This portable toilet was certainly adequate to our needs during that time and I recommend it. It is easy to set up and use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. Corey

customer_reviews.title: Identical to other portable toilets on the market, good price
customer_reviews.text: Toilet arrived in a damaged box, with a divot out of the lower handle. Doesn't seem to affect performance any, however. Have filled with clean water, and ready to take on first boondock excursion. Seems identical to other more expensive versions of this product on Amazon. Will see how it holds up. Most importantly, it should not leak, and should be able to be flushed easily. Too early to tell how it will work, yet.
customer_reviews.author: JWParker

customer_reviews.title: Our toddlers are much more easily managed during the potty training days
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for family camping. Our toddlers are much more easily managed during the potty training days, and momma likes not having to make the long cold walk to the outhouse at night. Perfect! And MUCH nicer than the type that consists only of a seat and a bucket lined with plastic bags. Easier, cleaner, much better for spacial needs inside the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Debra S. Long

customer_reviews.title: This is a great port a potty!
customer_reviews.text: The bomb. We went for the more expensive one. It's the Cadillac of port a pottys. I highly recommend this one. It flushed great. A handle for dumping the waste tank. You won't be sorry with this one.
customer_reviews.author: santa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a horse trailer and decided to equip it with a toilet. Honestly, the best decision ever. Horse shows typically last all day and to have this is awesome. We’ve cleaned it several times now (we always use a deodorant pack), very easy, comfortable to use, and the size is perfect. It fits right under one of the racks, out of the way. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: C. KC

customer_reviews.title: Solid but small bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the construction. The downside is the bowl size. Perfect for kids but very small for the average or large adults. I had the Portapotty from Sears years ago which was a very comfortable size and it was barely bigger than this one. Will only need this rarely so we'll live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tribble

customer_reviews.title: Correct Height - Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: My indoor plumbing failed and while waiting for a repair I purchased this product. I like the height of it so you can easily stand up. I also like the size of the holding tank. Quick and easy to unlatch and empty. A good buy for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Oldcrow

customer_reviews.title: I like the compact size and how easy it is to ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m A trucker and it really comes in handy for when you don’t have the hours to make it to truck stops or rest areas. I like the compact size and how easy it is to clean. The carry bag is really handy for privacy. I owned a portable toilet before and it was bulky and a real headache to empty but I don’t have trouble with this one. I should have bought this the first time
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lee Williams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good.......easy to set up and maintain. Fits well in our garage/ "great room". Soooo glad to have it....
customer_reviews.author: CJ Birds

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the portable toilet to use as an interim toilet in our small apartment until construction/ renovations are complete. Works as advertised. Have used as directed in the instructions without problems. The actual seat seems a bit flimsy, but has held up well with my 220 pounds of body weight. As in all such devices, I needed to pick up some packet deodorizers to assist with the scent after opening the dump valve. Time will tell if the seal on the valve continues to hold water. Would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more porta-potties!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping, MTB Races and emergencies. Works very well and super easy to dump and clean. I recommend shaking the sh@t out of it before dumping and refilling with clean water shaking the sh@t out of it and dumping it again. It does buil a slight pressure when “flushing” so I just pull the dump valve out a bit before I use it and that’s it. I also used RV tank solution to aide with the smell. Works great highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought it for his shop which has no plumbing. He is a big man and he is very happy with the quality and sturdiness of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sue McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a pontoon.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use this on the Pontoon (I have a privacy curtain) It's perfect for when you're drinking but you don't feel like getting in the water. Needless to say women love it. With that said no one is dropping a deuce in there so I can't speak to cleaning hot fresh poop. Very easy to clean liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Right-Height
customer_reviews.text: Seat height is great and indicator shows level as it fills; not just when it's full.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs some work on design
customer_reviews.text: The main problem with this product is cleaning it Also the seal leaks water from the top tank into the bottom A good product but it needs some tweaking on the design to make it a 5 star product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Fantastic Flusher
customer_reviews.text: This Serenelife Outdoor Portable Toilet is awesome. I am disabled, my knees are really bad so I depend on my tall home potty. Some of the restrooms in the Washington State Parks are not accessible and much to short for me. So I bought this potty. The height is perfect for sitting on and getting off of when the deed is done. The flush works smoothly. I love the piston flush, so much easier to use and cleaning the bowl is successfully done with one powerful flush. Sturdy, and holds a great deal of clean and waste water.
customer_reviews.author: RONDA SCHMIDT

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty - Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Great Condition Easy to clean. Very portable Not heavy. Very durable and stable.
customer_reviews.author: Nereida Cora

customer_reviews.title: As described had good reviews. So far no "deposits" made but have ...
customer_reviews.text: As described had good reviews. So far no "deposits" made but have leak tested and run a few tanks of clean water through and works as expected. The "bag" included was the only let down unlike the toilet was a bit cheap and flimsy. The product its self seems well made and solid though. Will see how it holds up in the real world.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore S Brahms

customer_reviews.title: Great portable solution for a convfeniently located bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This portable toilet is well made; fits our needs very well. only issue is that the plunger to add fresh water from the reservoir will only work when toilet seat is in closed position; it would be nice if it worked whether toilet seat was down or up. We have this set up in our shed by the pool to avoid going upstairs to use the bathroom; it would help if the instructions printed on the toilet seat were removable so we could post at eye level. these are only minor issues and on whole this is a great product at a great and fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: Travelers Friend
customer_reviews.text: Travel interstate for work. With virus sometimes hard to find a public restroom especially in rural areas serviced. This is a God send. Easy use, fits well in minivan. Can even use on trips with elderly parent right in vehicle privately. Its a true ladies friend and great for traveling with kids too.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Not large enough seat
customer_reviews.text: Too small opening . I'm sure it's good but not for us.
customer_reviews.author: VTX1

customer_reviews.title: This feels very sturdy. Seat and lid need care.
customer_reviews.text: I have been pretty happy with this. I see some comments that the seat has broken. I can see that. the seat and lid could be stronger. But the toilet itself is very solid and study. It is easy to use clean and dump. I am not a small person. I appreciate that the toilet feels sturdy when sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: J-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Can’t clean it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for camping. Found it impossible to empty all liquid from the bottom holding tank.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R Gering

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This Portable toilet sets you up higher than most. The cleaning set up is great and its easy to handle. This is the BEST unit we have ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: This one works well and is more sturdy than my last one. Its small, good for a van and i can lify it ok. The fill indicator is really good. CLOSE THE LID WHEN YOU FLUSH AND VENT BEFORE YOU DUMP. Others than that easy to use and nothing clogged. You need rv tp and the tank pods. My one complaint is the the bowl is shallow and and the seat is small.
customer_reviews.author: Gwynn

customer_reviews.title: Pump breaks after a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my shop that didn’t have e plumbing. It worked great at first, eye easy to empty too! But the last few months the pump to put water in the bowl got harder and harder to pump, it finally snapped a few weeks ago. So now it can’t pump water into the bowl. Not sure if it’s something I did wrong that made it build up so much pressure or if it’s just a design flaw? Debating what to do now because I need this but I don’t want to buy another to have the pump fail in a year!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I only used it for a couple days, but it worked great! So glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A camping must have!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! If you need one for camping this is good portable potty. You won't be sorry. We love it. Easy to clean and operate.
customer_reviews.author: cyn

customer_reviews.title: Does what it do do.
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a camping trip in our pop-up camper with two adults and our 9 year old. We found it to be portable, comfortable and easy to use. I did use a deodorant packet in the waste portion of the tank and had no issues with an odor coming from the toilet what so ever. Emptying the waste content was easy but I will say I gave it another rinse when we returned home then put about a 1/4 cup of bleach in the waste tank, filled it with water and let it sit for about 5 minutes. Rinsed it out again and let it dry so it’s ready for our next trip. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent portable toilet for camping or travelling, etc. It is sturdy and built well. A little bigger than I expected, but would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camping toilet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping because I do not like sharing toilets with the public. Easy to operate and comfortable to use. This worked out very well. Easy to empty and to clean and just perfect for camping!!!! So glad I ordered it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Caslake

customer_reviews.title: It was the best camping trip because of the Toliet
customer_reviews.text: It was the best camping trip because of the Toliet. I love that ease of it and it was easy to clean. However you just need to leave it open to dry out completely. I wish the instructions were a little better. Love love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Mannion

customer_reviews.title: Works great for long tent camping with my wife
customer_reviews.text: She's a tough girl, but this is the bit of luxury that really makes a long camping trip in the winter much easier. It's easy to fill with water and easy to dump out. The pump flush works great.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt stink!
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a spare bathroom in my house. Keep it in the bedroom and you cant even tell it is there! We have 3 other roommates and only 1 bathroom. Works well! :-D
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Handley

customer_reviews.title: No smell and nice to not have to run a mile to s bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This was great to have on camping trip and very easy to clean great full size seat I used potty smell pods only put in waste compartment and just water in flush Reservoir. We will also be using this at camp in winter
customer_reviews.author: Robin Grevior

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and her husband who are renovating their bathroom. They both love it! They said is saved them from having to pay to stay at a hotel for the whole week.
customer_reviews.author: mb43

customer_reviews.title: ... with at first but the product over all is great. Even my 5 year old can function it
customer_reviews.text: A little awkward to work with at first but the product over all is great. Even my 5 year old can function it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good Toilet
customer_reviews.text: Works! We travel with our Westfalia van, and have gone through four during a 25 year period. It’s been a year now, and we shall see how long it lasts. It’s simple to use, empty, and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mauny M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we need right now
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife so she doesn’t have to go back upstairs every time she needs to “pee” our downstairs bathroom is a work in progress so this is great for a temporary loo. Easy to empty and no leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Towers

customer_reviews.title: Rugged
customer_reviews.text: Not my porta potty. Excellent in every design feature. Despite what I read on reviews, it's a porta potty. Of course it is difficult and unpleasant to clean. They all are. Best advise: prepare the dump. Get rags and cleaning supplies ready. Clear the area and give yourself some elbow room.
customer_reviews.author: assurance

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD QUALITY, COMFORTABLE TO USE, EASY TO ROMEVE THE TANK TO EMPTY IT. JUST WENT CAMPING AND THE KIDS LOVED IT.
customer_reviews.author: victor villarruel

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This portable toilet is very easy to use and clean! We have had it for about a year now. A few months back we had lost the cap to screw onto the emptying valve. Now that we’re planning on using the toilet again during travel in our RV, I contacted customer service for a replacement cap and have received it within a week of contact. Very good customer service. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rae

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this several times now and I am very impressed. It only takes up a small amount of space, holds quite a bit of water and is very easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment for our annual Camping Trips
customer_reviews.text: It came in useful especially in the tent ... love the height and sturdiness. Don’t regret investing in it.... it was with the money
customer_reviews.author: Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Great manufacturer service
customer_reviews.text: My serenelife porta potty works well. However the cap for my fresh water got striped and would not close properly resulting in some water spilling out as i drove in my converted van. I had little hope of actually getting a replacement from the manufacture but I was so wrong! The customer service from Caleb was fantastic!! He was very attentive to making certain I got the part and that it worked. Kudos on product support.
customer_reviews.author: AK GG

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: We placed this in the back of our conversion van for emergency needs for the grandkids while we were on a cross country trek. Easy to use, once my husband showed me how it works, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: G. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Compact easy to use portable toilet
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy it was to set up. The first time it was used it worked just fine. We are satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Another casualty of Snow Storm Jaden
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the portable toilet!! He is a trucker and he said it changed his life!! However, while in Chicago during the winter storm he lost power and it froze and broke the unit. Who could blame it, just really sad that he doesn't have it for now.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design, doesn't empty well
customer_reviews.text: This toilet does not easily clean. We only ran water through to test it, and could not get all the water out of the holding tank! I can't imagine solids or urine in there and trying to clean it out!
customer_reviews.author: cjdine

customer_reviews.title: 5.3 Gallon
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for camping. No more leaving the tent at night for bathroom runs. Have heeded the warning about not letting pressure build up in bottom on hot days and not had any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: tabby1018

customer_reviews.title: Exactly As Described
customer_reviews.text: Although we have not had the opportunity to use it yet as we are confined due to the coronavirus, it appears to be exactly what we needed. Quick delivery ... reasonably priced. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Beck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Portable Toilet
customer_reviews.text: This portable toilet seems very good so far, I have had it just over a week. I will know how good it is as more time passes. Overall, the instructions are simple enough.
customer_reviews.author: rigsbyt

product_meta.title: SereneLife Outdoor Portable Toilet with Carry Bag, Travel Toilet with Level Indicator | | 3 Way Pistol Flush | Rotating Spout, for Camping, Boating, Traveling & Roadtripping
product_meta.description: Serene Life Model : SLCATL320Portable Outdoor Toilet System Portable Toilet - Outdoor And Travel Toilet, 5. 3 Gal. Features: Compact, Portable And Comfortable Easy Clean 3-Way Flush Nozzle Design Flushes and Rinses Bowl with Fresh Water Reserve Waste Water Tank Level Indication And VentNo External Water or Power Connections Require drugged And Durable Construction Corrosion-Resistant And Easy-to-Clean Button-Styled Pump Flusher Water Tank Capacity for Up to 50+ Flushes Easy Access Waste Tank for Quick Disposal Double-Sealed Drain Valve Protects Against Leaks And Odors A portable toilet has the unique ability to make your camping, boating or traveling experiences more enjoyable by providing a place for you to go whenever the urge strikes. This means you can stop digging holes and avoid long walks back to shared facilities when visiting campgrounds, camping on the beach or checking out popular tourist destinations! Since it is ultra lightweight, the Serene Life traveling toilet for adults can also be used as a portable toilet for boats, as a portable toilet for car rides or as an indoor portable toilet when you have guests or a broken stationary commode. An average bucket camping toilet gets the job done but this large portable toilet also reduces the mess when filling and emptying. This is because we have equipped it with an XL 5. 3 gallon tank, a splash-proof pouring spout and a layer of leak-free odor control protection. When you flush the commode, the 3 way nozzle also does a decent job of keeping the bowel clean. Unlike other travel toilet seats, this portable toilet with spout comes with its own carrying case. All you have to do is insert the components, cinch it up and you'll be all set to spend some time in the wilderness while still maintaining the modern comforts of home. Where will you go without worry? Don't wait to find out. Order your camping toilet today. Assembled Product Dimensions (L x W x H): 20.90 x 20.50 x 18.60 Inches
feature_bullets: GO IN COMFORT ANYWHERE: Whether heading off for an unforgettable backwoods camping trip or traveling with the family, this portable toilet kit by Serene Life lets you go wherever and whenever nature calls!

EXTRA LARGE TOILET TANK: The 5. 3 gallon toilet tank holds more than most other portable camping toilets, which means you'll have to empty it less often. And waste water tank level indication let you know when it's time!

CARRYING CASE INCLUDED: What kind of camping toilet chair doesn't come with a carrying case?! Our heavy duty portable toilet comes with a travel toilet bag that makes it super easy to tote around campsites.

#1 PORTABLE TRAVEL TOILET: Boating enthusiasts, frequent travelers And road tripping families turn to our compact traveling toilet seat because it can tag along without taking up too much room or weighing your down.

EXTREMELY EASY TO EMPTY: We've rigged this portable camping toilet with a splash-free rotating pour spout, allowing you to quickly And discreetly empty it when full. The odor-resistant materials also make sure it doesn't retain smells!
